album.title: Avalon Blues: The Complete 1928 Okeh Recordings

track.name: Louis Collins
comments: MJH is the best of the best. You can feel his love of making music in everything he does.
Fantastic stuff.
I used to play this song!
his voice man. . . His god damn sweet voice
i have him on my list of people i want to play like
I agree with skank_pit!!!
this is so beautiful.
The angles laid him away...
Sweet weepin' Jesus on the cross. What a tune.
sounds like devendra pretty much ripped him off
he must have massively influenced early Devendra Banhart, no?
he just has the warmest sound, voice and guitar
so sweet, bitter sweet
I'd listened to this many times and loved it but one day on the top deck of a bus I really heard the entire lyric for the first time. A tear rolled down my cheek.
The most soothing, relaxing, and soulful (all in one!) song of all-time.
Mmmmmmmmmmmm!
base blues .!!!!!
angels laid you away my friend, after they inspired your music, RIP
eugene92 - he was about 80 when he recorded!!
Pleasant but none of the power of original recording
